item.description:
Scott's idea for dinner was quite popular, so here we go! Join us on May 12th at
Pizzaria Marzano, a true traditional Neoplitan Pizzaria in Torrington CT. Wood burning ovens, fresh mozz cheese, San Marzano crushed tomato sauce, beer and wine (the second glass is only a nickle). Trust me folks this extablishment has been written up as one of the
best new pizza joints in CT!

PLEASE NOTE THE MEETUP TIME IS 7:30pm (Though I may be there by 7:00)

This Meetup is Hosted by Scott - his first as a host!

Some Ethnic Dining "Rules":

1) If you RSVP "YES" you are expected to SHOW UP!!! Be polite and make sure you change your RSVP by 6:00pm the previous day if need be. If you have to cancel or want to add yourself at the last minute call the restaurant.

2) Please bring cash, it is so much quicker and easier. Remember, no one leaves until the bill is paid - this is respect for the event's host and the other diners.

3) I will collect $1.00 from each participant for Meetup fees.

We're going to enjoy this one! - Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Pizzaria Marzano 5/12/10 7:30
